about_the_game:
So you think you’re above the law because you’re undead and have perfect hair? Think again. In FIRST BITE: BAD BLOOD, begin your life as a creature of the night and discover that being a vampire isn’t just all great sex and free meals. 🩸

BAD BLOOD is a DLC/mini-sequel for FIRST BITE, an LGBTQ+ dark comedy visual novel. available to download now on Steam and itch.io.

Pick up where you left off as Noe, a freshly turned vampire adjusting to immortality with your new family. But things aren’t quite as simple as you hoped when you’re being eased into vampire life by a murder-himbo obsessed with Eurodance, a narcissist with an online shopping addiction, and a wild card with a penchant for BDSM.

When Very Important Emails from the Council of Vampires the trio blissfully ignored come back to bite them in the form of an old flame with a thirst for more than just timely filed paperwork, you’ll need to prove that your existence is justified, or prepare to meet your maker…

For real this time.

You'll have to train with your housemates and choose your answers VERY wisely to ensure that you survive the wrath of your council-mandated Guardian Ad Bitem...

​FEATURES​

  • Partial voice acting with the talents of Alejandro Saab (Fire Emblem: Three Houses), Jalen Cassell (JoJo's Bizarre Adventure), and Marie Westbrook (Jujutsu Kaisen), and Jenny Yokobori (Genshin Impact)
  • Choose your pronouns, customize your characters name, and choose your sire
  • Non-sexual playthrough available
  • Three collectible CGs plus collectible post-game portraits
  • Good and Bad endings: Pick your choices wisely during your training sessions to influence the outcome of the game, but we WON'T punish you for making horny decisions (heart buttons are consequence-free!)

content_descriptors.notes: First Bite - Bad Blood is rated 18+ for strong language, violence (potential player death),  blood and gore, (optional) non-explicit sexual scenes, and other content that some players may find disturbing. Player discretion is advised.
